thread.title: Roger Waters Releasing First Solo Album In 25 Years This May, Here's A Sample Of Music [News]
thread.title_full: Roger Waters Releasing First Solo Album In 25 Years This May, Here's A Sample Of Music [News]

title: Roger Waters Releasing First Solo Album In 25 Years This May, Here's A Sample Of Music [News]
text:
Roger Waters Releasing First Solo Album in 25 Years This May, Here's a Sample of Music Featuring Radiohead producer Nigel Godrich at the helm of production.   20 minutes ago 1 
Roger Waters has officially announced May 19 as the release date of his first studio album in 25 years - "Is This the Life We Really Want?" 
The musician also offered a brief musical sample, you can check it out in the embedded player below. 
As previously reported, the Pink Floyd co-founder is working with producer Nigel Godrich (Radiohead, Paul McCartney).
